resources.string: Below you will find the options to see indepth device hardware and sowftware details this includes network identifires

Rom Name is A free and open-source operating system for various devices, based on the Android mobile platform. Major thanks to Arrow Os. Further improvements and optimizations have been contibuted by the community. Thank you all developers, designers and testers

Below are reset options Note Reset is a very interesting option especially when your device is ma-functioning your phone performs better, becomes faster, super smooth with more free space on memory and better breathing space. Beare that all data will be erased if not backed-up, accounts and other information will also be deleted.

Below are reset options Note Reset is a very interesting option especially when your device is ma-functioning your phone performs better, becomes faster, super smooth with more free space on memory and better breathing space. Beare that all data will be erased if not backed-up, accounts and other information will also be deleted.
On-The-Go-Mode this feature allows you to be mobile while using your mobile

On-The-Go-Mode uses transparency and camera data to keep you aware of where you are walking. This mode aims to keep you as safe as possible should you attempt to walk and text. It uses transparency and your camera to keep you aware of your surroundings. In addition, On-The-Go-Mode enables the camera feed and underlays it on screen. it will then seem as if your phone screen is almost invisible that helps when your walking in a park at night anf you dont have to move your phone in couple of steps.
Warning you still need to pay attention to your surroundings
Tap, Tap provides over 50 actions that can be run from double or triple taps on the back of your device

The gesture can also be fully controlled, to only run under certain conditions, or run different actions in different scenarios; such as only when an app is running, the screen is off, or when listening to music..many more options are available
